programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
The Edge of Seventeen – Das Jahr der Entscheidung
programme.desc: The Edge of Seventeen: Directed by Kelly Fremon Craig. With Hailee Steinfeld, Haley Lu Richardson, Blake Jenner, Kyra Sedgwick. High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1878870/","name":"The Edge of Seventeen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE2NjE4NjYyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk3MjQ0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1878870/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"darkojedi"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Recommended","reviewBody":"John Hughes is an unmistakable touchstone of the coming of age 1980s high school dramedy. Films like Sixteen Candles, The Breakfast Club, Pretty in Pink and Ferris Bueller's Day Off chronicled the adolescent experience of growing up, dealing with teen angst and self-actualization while mixing in a dash of old fashioned screwball comedy which at once provides relatable laughter for the viewer while making the dramatic pills easier to swallow. All of those undeniably come to mind when watching the directorial debut of Post Grad screenwriter Kelly Fremon Craig, The Edge of Seventeen, a coming of age high school comedy about a socially awkward and unhappy teenage girl named Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld from True Grit) whose best friend enters a relationship with her hunky older brother (Blake Jenner from Everybody Wants Some). And yet it is Amy Heckerling's Fast Times at Ridgemont High that The Edge of Seventeen finds its closest antecedent in, providing at once a funny and sympathetic rom com and a decidedly darker, more explicit look at budding female sexuality in a world adorned with dumb horny males who care nothing for the heroine's plight and emotional crossroads. At times its unbearable watching Nadine suffer while at the same time the film doesn't deny her own complicitness in the creation of her teenage misery. At first on the outset this looked like another Juno/Ghost World lovechild but as it progressed I was surprised how funny, charming, touching and well thought out this portrait of adolescent fear, anxiety and depression really was. Sure we've seen this movie done to death, but The Edge of Seventeen provided a fresh spin on the proceedings that kept it from blending together with what came before it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":116765,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-11-18","keywords":"adolescence,coming of age film,scantily clad female,panties,white panties","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Now Playing","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi450082329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5MzY4Njg2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTY5MTM2MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5MzY4Njg2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTY5MTM2MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2794962/","name":"Hailee Steinfeld"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4726634/","name":"Haley Lu Richardson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4296357/","name":"Blake Jenner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2609807/","name":"Kelly Fremon Craig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035761/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099734/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033486/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2609807/","name":"Kelly Fremon Craig"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bad Moms
Bad Moms
programme.desc:
Bad Moms: Directed by Jon Lucas, Scott Moore. With Mila Kunis, Kathryn Hahn, Kristen Bell, Christina Applegate. When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun and comedic self-indulgence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4651520/","name":"Bad Moms","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNzE5MTgwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjM4OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun and comedic self-indulgence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4651520/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hjalsayegh"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A thirty something's fantasy","reviewBody":"In your own head you are not only supermom you are also a martyr that would sacrifice everything for your family.

You are ridiculously hot, you do everything at home and at work (literally) and without you the world would come crumbling down, yet you are under appreciated and treated like dirt.

All in 6 inch heels, flawless make-up and not a hair out of place...

The movie is what Hollywood thinks soccormoms fantasy themselves as. They would break away from their roles and be "bad girls" for a day and that would bring balance back to the force.

I didn't mind the cliché however the humor here is really either hit or miss. You'll either stare in silence at the screen going "what? was that supposed to be a joke? It looked painful/offensive/silly" then there are the jokes that land and those are really funny in comparison... they don't happen often enough to cover for the bad jokes though.

Harmless enough of a movie if there is nothing else on but otherwise I wouldn't recommend it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120758,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2016-07-29","keywords":"female full frontal nudity,pubic hair,female nudity,nudity,crying woman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"'Bad Moms' Trailer With Commentary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi483112729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3NjAwMzE3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE3MDQ0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3NjAwMzE3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE3MDQ0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mila Kunis, Kristen Bell, and Kathryn Hahn provide commentary on the 'Bad Moms' trailer."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005109/","name":"Mila Kunis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1063517/","name":"Kathryn Hahn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068338/","name":"Kristen Bell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524190/","name":"Jon Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601859/","name":"Scott Moore"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099734/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0577142/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524190/","name":"Jon Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601859/","name":"Scott Moore"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Our Ladies
Our Ladies
programme.desc:
Our Ladies: Directed by Michael Caton-Jones. With Abigail Lawrie, Rona Morison, Marli Siu, Tallulah Greive. programme.title: An American Pickle
An American Pickle
programme.desc: An American Pickle: Directed by Brandon Trost. With Seth Rogen, Sarah Snook, Molly Evensen, Eliot Glazer. An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing amazing but it was enjoyable","reviewBody":"As others have pointed out this is not your typical Seth Rogen film. This is his attempt to make a fish out of water story in the style of Splash or Big and while he doesn't reinvent the wheel in doing so there were some enjoyable moments. This is obviously meant to be a film which you can watch with you family, it is not vulgar and it focuses on the importance of family values and relationships. There are many moments/jokes in this film that have to do with Judaism which Seth has joked about previously, but here this is much more of a love note to that part of his life. I think maybe some of the negativity being directed at this film is because some people don't understand that aspect of it. They instead are expecting the normal stoner humour Seth Rogen. I think this movie is worth watching if you want to see a different side of Seth and don't mind seeing the things I mentioned.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21175,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 9059704, Title: An American Pickle, --- Description: An American Pickle: Directed by Brandon Trost. With Seth Rogen, Sarah Snook, Molly Evensen, Eliot Glazer. An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers","dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing amazing but it was enjoyable","reviewBody":"As others have pointed out this is not your typical Seth Rogen film. This is his attempt to make a fish out of water story in the style of Splash or Big and while he doesn't reinvent the wheel in doing so there were some enjoyable moments. This is obviously meant to be a film which you can watch with you family, it is not vulgar and it focuses on the importance of family values and relationships. There are many moments/jokes in this film that have to do with Judaism which Seth has joked about previously, but here this is much more of a love note to that part of his life. I think maybe some of the negativity being directed at this film is because some people don't understand that aspect of it. They instead are expecting the normal stoner humour Seth Rogen. I think this movie is worth watching if you want to see a different side of Seth and don't mind seeing the things I mentioned.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21175,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Old Surehand
Old Surehand
programme.desc: Old Surehand: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Larry Pennell, Letícia Román. Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059538/","name":"Old Surehand","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFiYjdiODQtZWMyNy00Y2MyLWEyN2ItMTRjNDA1OTZiYmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIxOTQ0MA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thrilling and touching story about Old Surehand and Winnetou , well performed by Granger and Brice","reviewBody":"This is a highly entertaining film based on Karl May trilogy novels , it starts with Old Surehand ( Stewart Granger ) in an exciting opening sequence when he rides onto the screen and soon rescues to train passengers attacked by bandits . After that , the outlaws killing American buffalo for originating a war against white-men . Later on , Indians raid a ranch , the Indian chief's son comes to the little town for a peace treatise but he's treacherously murdered . Meanwhile , Old Sureland befriends an old man ad his nephew ( Letitia Milan who played the first Mario Bava's Giallo: ¨Girl who knew too much¨ ) and his fiancé , a judge assistant ( Terence Hill or Mario Girotti, previous his successful Trinity ). There's an emotional love story between them , and they are taken prisoners by Indians . Sureland set on pursuit of his killer's brother and attempts to pacify the Indians . Of course , he encounters his Indian-brother Winnetou ( Pierre Brice ) at an emotional meeting . The clues lead a gunrunner named the General ( Larry Pennell ).\n\nThis is an agreeable episode about one of the series of popular German made Western , featuring the duo formed by valiant ¨Old Surehand¨ and immortal ¨Winnetou¨ , they repeat their same noted roles as dignified as always . This enjoyable saga benefits from sensational adventures , shootouts , larger-than-life characters and spectacular scenarios shot in Yugoslavia . Stewart Granger took the role in two occasions ( ¨Among vultures¨ and this one ) and Pierre Brice starred all the series and he went on filming television episodes . Chemistry between them is quite match , Stewart Granger scores especially high marks , he plays with mirth and liking manner . His predecessor was the serious Lex Barker who starred a diverse character but the roles are pretty similar , he played the most part of series : ¨Apache gold(1963)¨ by Harald Reinl, ¨Apaches last Battle(1964)¨ by Hugo Fregonese, ¨Last of renegades(1964)¨, ¨The desperate trail¨, ¨Old Shatterland(1966)¨ by Harald Philipp, ¨In the valley of death(1968)¨ by Harald Reinl , besides Rod Cameron starred only one : ¨Old Firehand¨ directed by Alfred Vohrer. The film displays a colorful cinematography and a catching musical score by usual series , Martin Bottcher . The motion picture produced by Rialto Productions is convincingly directed by Alfred Vohrer who directed various Karl May titles , besides he was a German thriller expert called Krimi ( Edward Wallace adaptation ) .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"1965-12-14","keywords":"buffalo herd,male female relationship,barroom brawl,reprisal,vindication","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672074/","name":"Larry Pennell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi
programme.desc: Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Götz George, Uschi Glas. On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's protection." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0061197/","name":"Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M2YTUwNzctNDM5OC00Njk4LWJiMmQtODAyMzkwNjM0YjI4L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's prote","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0061197/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Karl May the 8th","reviewBody":"I did not know how many films were made prior to this (based on Karl Mays novels), but another reviewer seems to be on top of that. And while I haven't seen them all (or rather rewatched, because I loved them as a kid), I can say that it is an endearing and lovely series of films that were made. And that can only be a testament of the novels they were based on - which obviously I haven't read - shame on me.\n\nIt is nice to see the usual suspect reprise their leading roles, but also have some other known German (and other European) actors being added here. I just realize that I never talked about the "native American" language that they use in these movies ... I have no idea on what that is based on ... but it does not sound as if they are mocking the people speaking them. Generally speaking you can feel that there is love for the native Americans. It is nice to see a morally "right" view on things ... or at least a not one sided "white man" approach and outlook on them.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1966-08-19","keywords":"spaghetti western,italo western,films about indians,american indian,woman saloon owner","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313443/","name":"Götz George"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winnetou
Winnetou I
programme.desc: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. And music (Martin Boettcher) is very beautiful. .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,spaghetti western,italo western,opening action scene,violence","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0894949/","name":"Marie Versini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718243/","name":"Harald Reinl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677457/","name":"Harald G. Petersson"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Lex Barker (role=Old Shatterhand), Pierre Brice (role=Winnetou), Marie Versini (role=Nscho-tschi), Mario Adorf (role=Frederick Santer), Walter Barnes (role=Bill Jones), Chris Howland (role=Lord Tuff-Tuff), Ralf Wolter (role=Sam Hawkens), Milivoje Popovic-Mavid (role=Intschu-tschuna), Dunja Rajter (role=Belle), Niksa Stefanini (role=Bullock), Branko Spoljar (role=Bancroft), Husein Cokic (role=Will Parker)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0057687, Title: Winnetou, --- Description: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986","dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. And music (Martin Boettcher) is very beautiful. .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,spaghetti western,italo western,opening action scene,violence","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0894949/","name":"Marie Versini"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718243/","name":"Harald Reinl"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063537/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677457/","name":"Harald G. programme.title: Der Ölprinz
Der Ölprinz
programme.desc: Der Ölprinz: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Harald Leipnitz, Macha Méril. Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059958/","name":"Der Ölprinz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY4NDdjMTItZThmNC00OGUzLTg1YTUtY2I4OTk5NWU2YWE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059958/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dcnilsen54"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolute Drivel","reviewBody":"I must admit I am not really a fan of foreign westerns- and as an American- why should I be!? ..but this one really takes the cake- I could not even finish watching this rotten tomato...totally fake voices, poor audio dubbing, actors that are the fakest excuse for Indians I have ever seen..an almost blatant disregard for a coherent plot..constant injections of idiotic scenes which have little or nothing to do with the story...lousy script, terrible actors..just FAKE, FAKE , FAKE in every respect...how I made it through an entire hour I do not know..How in the world these other people can give this movie a good review is beyond me- but it just goes to show that the vast majority of these reviews are from people who would not know a good movie if it walked up behind them and bit them in the gluteus maximus","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,apache,settler,arizona,arizona territory","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500505/","name":"Harald Leipnitz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Old Surehand
Old Surehand
programme.desc: Old Surehand: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Larry Pennell, Letícia Román. Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059538/","name":"Old Surehand","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFiYjdiODQtZWMyNy00Y2MyLWEyN2ItMTRjNDA1OTZiYmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIxOTQ0MA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thrilling and touching story about Old Surehand and Winnetou , well performed by Granger and Brice","reviewBody":"This is a highly entertaining film based on Karl May trilogy novels , it starts with Old Surehand ( Stewart Granger ) in an exciting opening sequence when he rides onto the screen and soon rescues to train passengers attacked by bandits . After that , the outlaws killing American buffalo for originating a war against white-men . Later on , Indians raid a ranch , the Indian chief's son comes to the little town for a peace treatise but he's treacherously murdered . Meanwhile , Old Sureland befriends an old man ad his nephew ( Letitia Milan who played the first Mario Bava's Giallo: ¨Girl who knew too much¨ ) and his fiancé , a judge assistant ( Terence Hill or Mario Girotti, previous his successful Trinity ). There's an emotional love story between them , and they are taken prisoners by Indians . Sureland set on pursuit of his killer's brother and attempts to pacify the Indians . Of course , he encounters his Indian-brother Winnetou ( Pierre Brice ) at an emotional meeting . The clues lead a gunrunner named the General ( Larry Pennell ).\n\nThis is an agreeable episode about one of the series of popular German made Western , featuring the duo formed by valiant ¨Old Surehand¨ and immortal ¨Winnetou¨ , they repeat their same noted roles as dignified as always . This enjoyable saga benefits from sensational adventures , shootouts , larger-than-life characters and spectacular scenarios shot in Yugoslavia . Stewart Granger took the role in two occasions ( ¨Among vultures¨ and this one ) and Pierre Brice starred all the series and he went on filming television episodes . Chemistry between them is quite match , Stewart Granger scores especially high marks , he plays with mirth and liking manner . His predecessor was the serious Lex Barker who starred a diverse character but the roles are pretty similar , he played the most part of series : ¨Apache gold(1963)¨ by Harald Reinl, ¨Apaches last Battle(1964)¨ by Hugo Fregonese, ¨Last of renegades(1964)¨, ¨The desperate trail¨, ¨Old Shatterland(1966)¨ by Harald Philipp, ¨In the valley of death(1968)¨ by Harald Reinl , besides Rod Cameron starred only one : ¨Old Firehand¨ directed by Alfred Vohrer. The film displays a colorful cinematography and a catching musical score by usual series , Martin Bottcher . The motion picture produced by Rialto Productions is convincingly directed by Alfred Vohrer who directed various Karl May titles , besides he was a German thriller expert called Krimi ( Edward Wallace adaptation ) .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"1965-12-14","keywords":"buffalo herd,male female relationship,barroom brawl,reprisal,vindication","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672074/","name":"Larry Pennell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Unter Geiern
Unter Geiern
programme.desc: Unter Geiern: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Pierre Brice, Götz George, Elke Sommer, Stewart Granger. Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058709/","name":"Unter Geiern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJkZTA3ZDgtMzViMS00YzY3LWFhZTMtZTdlZDM0ZDYxMjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA4ODc3ODU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058709/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"whpratt1"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrible Film","reviewBody":"Thought I might be interested in this film because I like the acting of Stewart Granger over the years and in this so called film he plays the role of a so called superman named "Old Surehand" which is a big joke. The acting is horrible and you will be completely confused as to what is really going on between Indians and white people. This film should be called a comedy film because the entire film goes around in circle after circle and makes absolutely no sense at all. Elke Sommer, (Annie Dillman) was added to the film to give some romantic charm to the film but her acting and performance was a big waste of time. I wish I had never seen this film, it is a HORRIBLE FILM!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1549,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"keywords":"buxom,apache indian,arizona territory,apache territory,bigotry","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313443/","name":"Götz George"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0813961/","name":"Elke Sommer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017157/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045465/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796242/","name":"Johanna Sibelius"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi
Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi
programme.desc: Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Götz George, Uschi Glas. On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's protection." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0061197/","name":"Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M2YTUwNzctNDM5OC00Njk4LWJiMmQtODAyMzkwNjM0YjI4L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's prote","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0061197/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Karl May the 8th","reviewBody":"I did not know how many films were made prior to this (based on Karl Mays novels), but another reviewer seems to be on top of that. And while I haven't seen them all (or rather rewatched, because I loved them as a kid), I can say that it is an endearing and lovely series of films that were made. And that can only be a testament of the novels they were based on - which obviously I haven't read - shame on me.\n\nIt is nice to see the usual suspect reprise their leading roles, but also have some other known German (and other European) actors being added here. I just realize that I never talked about the "native American" language that they use in these movies ... I have no idea on what that is based on ... but it does not sound as if they are mocking the people speaking them. Generally speaking you can feel that there is love for the native Americans. It is nice to see a morally "right" view on things ... or at least a not one sided "white man" approach and outlook on them.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1966-08-19","keywords":"spaghetti western,italo western,films about indians,american indian,woman saloon owner","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313443/","name":"Götz George"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

And while I haven't seen them all (or rather rewatched, because I loved them as a kid), I can say that it is an endearing and lovely series of films that were made. programme.title: Winnetou
Winnetou III
programme.desc: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. And music (Martin Boettcher) is very beautiful. .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,spaghetti western,italo western,opening action scene,violence","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0894949/","name":"Marie Versini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718243/","name":"Harald Reinl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677457/","name":"Harald G. Petersson"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Der Ölprinz
Der Ölprinz
programme.desc: Der Ölprinz: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Harald Leipnitz, Macha Méril. Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059958/","name":"Der Ölprinz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY4NDdjMTItZThmNC00OGUzLTg1YTUtY2I4OTk5NWU2YWE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059958/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dcnilsen54"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolute Drivel","reviewBody":"I must admit I am not really a fan of foreign westerns- and as an American- why should I be!? ..but this one really takes the cake- I could not even finish watching this rotten tomato...totally fake voices, poor audio dubbing, actors that are the fakest excuse for Indians I have ever seen..an almost blatant disregard for a coherent plot..constant injections of idiotic scenes which have little or nothing to do with the story...lousy script, terrible actors..just FAKE, FAKE , FAKE in every respect...how I made it through an entire hour I do not know..How in the world these other people can give this movie a good review is beyond me- but it just goes to show that the vast majority of these reviews are from people who would not know a good movie if it walked up behind them and bit them in the gluteus maximus","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,apache,settler,arizona,arizona territory","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500505/","name":"Harald Leipnitz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Old Surehand
Old Surehand
programme.desc: Old Surehand: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Larry Pennell, Letícia Román. Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059538/","name":"Old Surehand","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFiYjdiODQtZWMyNy00Y2MyLWEyN2ItMTRjNDA1OTZiYmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIxOTQ0MA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thrilling and touching story about Old Surehand and Winnetou , well performed by Granger and Brice","reviewBody":"This is a highly entertaining film based on Karl May trilogy novels , it starts with Old Surehand ( Stewart Granger ) in an exciting opening sequence when he rides onto the screen and soon rescues to train passengers attacked by bandits . After that , the outlaws killing American buffalo for originating a war against white-men . Later on , Indians raid a ranch , the Indian chief's son comes to the little town for a peace treatise but he's treacherously murdered . Meanwhile , Old Sureland befriends an old man ad his nephew ( Letitia Milan who played the first Mario Bava's Giallo: ¨Girl who knew too much¨ ) and his fiancé , a judge assistant ( Terence Hill or Mario Girotti, previous his successful Trinity ). There's an emotional love story between them , and they are taken prisoners by Indians . Sureland set on pursuit of his killer's brother and attempts to pacify the Indians . Of course , he encounters his Indian-brother Winnetou ( Pierre Brice ) at an emotional meeting . The clues lead a gunrunner named the General ( Larry Pennell ).\n\nThis is an agreeable episode about one of the series of popular German made Western , featuring the duo formed by valiant ¨Old Surehand¨ and immortal ¨Winnetou¨ , they repeat their same noted roles as dignified as always . This enjoyable saga benefits from sensational adventures , shootouts , larger-than-life characters and spectacular scenarios shot in Yugoslavia . Stewart Granger took the role in two occasions ( ¨Among vultures¨ and this one ) and Pierre Brice starred all the series and he went on filming television episodes . Chemistry between them is quite match , Stewart Granger scores especially high marks , he plays with mirth and liking manner . His predecessor was the serious Lex Barker who starred a diverse character but the roles are pretty similar , he played the most part of series : ¨Apache gold(1963)¨ by Harald Reinl, ¨Apaches last Battle(1964)¨ by Hugo Fregonese, ¨Last of renegades(1964)¨, ¨The desperate trail¨, ¨Old Shatterland(1966)¨ by Harald Philipp, ¨In the valley of death(1968)¨ by Harald Reinl , besides Rod Cameron starred only one : ¨Old Firehand¨ directed by Alfred Vohrer. The film displays a colorful cinematography and a catching musical score by usual series , Martin Bottcher . The motion picture produced by Rialto Productions is convincingly directed by Alfred Vohrer who directed various Karl May titles , besides he was a German thriller expert called Krimi ( Edward Wallace adaptation ) .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"1965-12-14","keywords":"buffalo herd,male female relationship,barroom brawl,reprisal,vindication","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672074/","name":"Larry Pennell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0059538, Title: Old Surehand, --- Description: Old Surehand: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Larry Pennell, Letícia Román. Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059538/","name":"Old Surehand","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFiYjdiODQtZWMyNy00Y2MyLWEyN2ItMTRjNDA1OTZiYmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIxOTQ0MA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059538/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes","dateCreated":"2007-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thrilling and touching story about Old Surehand and Winnetou , well performed by Granger and Brice","reviewBody":"This is a highly entertaining film based on Karl May trilogy novels , it starts with Old Surehand ( Stewart Granger ) in an exciting opening sequence when he rides onto the screen and soon rescues to train passengers attacked by bandits . After that , the outlaws killing American buffalo for originating a war against white-men . Later on , Indians raid a ranch , the Indian chief's son comes to the little town for a peace treatise but he's treacherously murdered . Meanwhile , Old Sureland befriends an old man ad his nephew ( Letitia Milan who played the first Mario Bava's Giallo: ¨Girl who knew too much¨ ) and his fiancé , a judge assistant ( Terence Hill or Mario Girotti, previous his successful Trinity ). There's an emotional love story between them , and they are taken prisoners by Indians . Sureland set on pursuit of his killer's brother and attempts to pacify the Indians . Of course , he encounters his Indian-brother Winnetou ( Pierre Brice ) at an emotional meeting . The clues lead a gunrunner named the General ( Larry Pennell ).\n\nThis is an agreeable episode about one of the series of popular German made Western , featuring the duo formed by valiant ¨Old Surehand¨ and immortal ¨Winnetou¨ , they repeat their same noted roles as dignified as always . This enjoyable saga benefits from sensational adventures , shootouts , larger-than-life characters and spectacular scenarios shot in Yugoslavia . Stewart Granger took the role in two occasions ( ¨Among vultures¨ and this one ) and Pierre Brice starred all the series and he went on filming television episodes . Chemistry between them is quite match , Stewart Granger scores especially high marks , he plays with mirth and liking manner . His predecessor was the serious Lex Barker who starred a diverse character but the roles are pretty similar , he played the most part of series : ¨Apache gold(1963)¨ by Harald Reinl, ¨Apaches last Battle(1964)¨ by Hugo Fregonese, ¨Last of renegades(1964)¨, ¨The desperate trail¨, ¨Old Shatterland(1966)¨ by Harald Philipp, ¨In the valley of death(1968)¨ by Harald Reinl , besides Rod Cameron starred only one : ¨Old Firehand¨ directed by Alfred Vohrer. The film displays a colorful cinematography and a catching musical score by usual series , Martin Bottcher . The motion picture produced by Rialto Productions is convincingly directed by Alfred Vohrer who directed various Karl May titles , besides he was a German thriller expert called Krimi ( Edward Wallace adaptation ) .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"1965-12-14","keywords":"buffalo herd,male female relationship,barroom brawl,reprisal,vindication","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672074/","name":"Larry Pennell"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"],"duration":"PT1H30M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winnetou
Winnetou I
programme.desc: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. And music (Martin Boettcher) is very beautiful. .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,spaghetti western,italo western,opening action scene,violence","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0894949/","name":"Marie Versini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718243/","name":"Harald Reinl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677457/","name":"Harald G. Petersson"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Unter Geiern
Unter Geiern
programme.desc: Unter Geiern: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Pierre Brice, Götz George, Elke Sommer, Stewart Granger. Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058709/","name":"Unter Geiern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJkZTA3ZDgtMzViMS00YzY3LWFhZTMtZTdlZDM0ZDYxMjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA4ODc3ODU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058709/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"whpratt1"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrible Film","reviewBody":"Thought I might be interested in this film because I like the acting of Stewart Granger over the years and in this so called film he plays the role of a so called superman named "Old Surehand" which is a big joke. The acting is horrible and you will be completely confused as to what is really going on between Indians and white people. This film should be called a comedy film because the entire film goes around in circle after circle and makes absolutely no sense at all. Elke Sommer, (Annie Dillman) was added to the film to give some romantic charm to the film but her acting and performance was a big waste of time. I wish I had never seen this film, it is a HORRIBLE FILM!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1549,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"keywords":"buxom,apache indian,arizona territory,apache territory,bigotry","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313443/","name":"Götz George"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0813961/","name":"Elke Sommer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017157/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045465/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796242/","name":"Johanna Sibelius"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0058709, Title: Unter Geiern, --- Description: Unter Geiern: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Pierre Brice, Götz George, Elke Sommer, Stewart Granger. Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058709/","name":"Unter Geiern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJkZTA3ZDgtMzViMS00YzY3LWFhZTMtZTdlZDM0ZDYxMjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA4ODc3ODU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058709/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"whpratt1","dateCreated":"2008-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrible Film","reviewBody":"Thought I might be interested in this film because I like the acting of Stewart Granger over the years and in this so called film he plays the role of a so called superman named "Old Surehand" which is a big joke. The acting is horrible and you will be completely confused as to what is really going on between Indians and white people. This film should be called a comedy film because the entire film goes around in circle after circle and makes absolutely no sense at all. Elke Sommer, (Annie Dillman) was added to the film to give some romantic charm to the film but her acting and performance was a big waste of time. I wish I had never seen this film, it is a HORRIBLE FILM!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1549,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"keywords":"buxom,apache indian,arizona territory,apache territory,bigotry","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313443/","name":"Götz George","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0813961/","name":"Elke Sommer"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017157/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045465/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796242/","name":"Johanna Sibelius"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Der Ölprinz
Der Ölprinz
programme.desc: Der Ölprinz: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Harald Leipnitz, Macha Méril. Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059958/","name":"Der Ölprinz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY4NDdjMTItZThmNC00OGUzLTg1YTUtY2I4OTk5NWU2YWE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059958/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dcnilsen54"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolute Drivel","reviewBody":"I must admit I am not really a fan of foreign westerns- and as an American- why should I be!? ..but this one really takes the cake- I could not even finish watching this rotten tomato...totally fake voices, poor audio dubbing, actors that are the fakest excuse for Indians I have ever seen..an almost blatant disregard for a coherent plot..constant injections of idiotic scenes which have little or nothing to do with the story...lousy script, terrible actors..just FAKE, FAKE , FAKE in every respect...how I made it through an entire hour I do not know..How in the world these other people can give this movie a good review is beyond me- but it just goes to show that the vast majority of these reviews are from people who would not know a good movie if it walked up behind them and bit them in the gluteus maximus","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,apache,settler,arizona,arizona territory","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500505/","name":"Harald Leipnitz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winnetou
Winnetou III
programme.desc: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. And music (Martin Boettcher) is very beautiful. .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,spaghetti western,italo western,opening action scene,violence","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0894949/","name":"Marie Versini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718243/","name":"Harald Reinl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677457/","name":"Harald G. Petersson"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="
